parameters.name: Effect
parameters.description: Specifies whether to allow or deny access.

parameters.name: IdentityType
parameters.description: The identity type. Valid values: USER and CLIENT.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ApsaraMQ for MQTT instance.

parameters.name: PermitAction
parameters.description: The permissions that you want to grant.

parameters.name: Topic
parameters.description: The topics on which you want to grant permissions. Multi-level topics and wildcard characters are supported.
